comments.raw_text:
Currently, struct BindData has an anonymous union with only one element.

That is silly. This should be an abstract base class with one virtual method, and two derived classes.
comments.author: jorendorff@mozilla.com
comments.text:

jwalden@mit.edu
comments.text: BindData goes away in the destructuring patches I have, although the exact design of how that goes may be up for debate, of course.  So just making the minimal refactoring might not be helpful to me.  I dunno, I haven't tried looking at/rebasing into the let patch at all yet...
comments.author: jwalden@mit.edu
